_header: Honoured be Thou Holy Ghost on high
Title(s): Pèlerinage de l’âme; Song of Angels and All Saints at Pentecost
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Song of Angels and All Saints at Pentecost, in the English translation of the Pèlerinage de l’âme — three stanzas rhyme royal

Bod770.First Lines:
Honored be þou holy goost on hyþat vn to puple of so
                    poore astate…
Bod770.Last Lines:
…fful myȝtily þi lawez to defendeHonoured be
                    þou lord with outen ende
Bod770.Attributed Title: Song for þe fest of wit sonday (f. 96v)

OxfCCC237.First Lines:
Honowered be þowe holygooste an hygheþat vn to pepull of
                    soo poore asstatte…
OxfCCC237.Last Lines:
…ffull myghtely þi lawes to defendehonowred be þu
                    lorde with owtyn ende
OxfCCC237.Note: First two stanzas (on f. 132) written as prose

CamGon124.First Lines:
honowred be þu holy goost onlyþat vn to peple of so pore
                    astate…
CamGon124.Last Lines:
…ful myȝtily þis lawes to defendehonowred be
                    þow lord wiþ owten ende
CamGon124.Attributed Title:
the aungeles songe & alle oþer seyntes in þe feste of þe
                    holy Pentecost (f. 246)

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Honourede be þou holy goste on hyeþat vnto pepull of so
                    poore astate…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…ffull myghtely þi lawes to defende honorede beþou
                    ihesu withouten ende

BLEge615.First Lines: HOnured be thu holy gost in hieThat vn to poeple of so pore astate…
BLEge615.Last Lines: …fful myghtly thi law ys to offendeHonured be thu lord with owt ende

Honoured be þu holy goost in hyThat vn to peple of so pore
                    estate…
